alert.note: Alert for Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:42PM CDT until June 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PONTOTOC...UNION AND NORTHWESTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Albany, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, New Albany, Trace State Park, Saltillo, Ecru, New Harmony, Furrs, Sherman, Blue Springs, Shari, Hortontown, Endville, Cherry Creek, Branyan, Ellistown, Pumpkin Center, Jug Fork, Baker, Flowerdale and Glenfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
